comments:
Build ID: 3.3.1 M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
In Java Compiler -> Errors/Warnings I unchecked "Enable project specific settings" and pressed apply.  It prompted to rebuild project, which I accepted, then I pressed cancel on the Properties Dialog.  NPE below.

More information:

I cannot reproduce this on 3.3.1 or 3.4. The only place the change set collection can be null is after the dispose method has been called.

Is there ever a case where the dispose method is called prior to the performOK method?

sending to platform UI for comment about the ordering of calls for dialog pages.

dispose is called from the close() method of the dialog (see PreferenceDialog#close()) which is called after okPressed.

James can you do this consistently?
Unfortunately I can't seem to reproduce the problem either. It's not a dialogue I use frequently, so I doubt whether I will encounter the problem again.
